Translations.Text: Alo. Wigi d issekniyen n Tezmamt, u d Leqwoan ipbegginen
Ahat wid ijehlen ssaramen ad ilin d imvuaen
Eoo iten ad ccen, ad zhun, a ten issedhu usirem. Deqqal ad eoen
Ur Nesquccu tamdint, siwa ma d ayen i s iuran, ipwassnen
Ur illi lois ara d isqeoben, ne$ ara iswexxoen lajel is
Nnan: "a win u$uo d irs usmekti! Kecc, war ccekk, d aoehbani
Acimi ur a$ d tusiv ara, s lmalayek, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Ur Nesrusu lmalayek, siwa s tidep. Imiren, ur pganin
Ih, Nekwni Nessers ed asmekti. Ih, Nekwni a Neareb fellas
Ni$ Nuzen ed, uqbel ik, i ikabaren imezwura
Ur ten id ippas umazan, mebla ma ttahan fellas
Akka ay t Nessekcam deg ulawen ibe$wviyen
Ur uminen yis, ulamma ooan d imezwura tannumi
Xas ad asen Nelli tabburt igenni, ad ppalin $uoes
a d inin, war ccekk: "ittules ieoi nne$, ne$ nekwni d agdud iwumi sseeren
Ni$ Nerra itran deg igenni. Ncebbee iten i wid ipmuqulen
Nesdari ten, si yal cciian imenfi
Kkes ed win d issemeessen s tufra, A p iddu, fellas, ujajie n uuee
Tamurt Nessewsaa p; Nerra fellas idurar; Nessem$i d, degs, yal cci, s lmizan
Nerra, degs, lqut i kunwi, akw i wid ur tecceccayem ara
Lexzayen n yal cci, $uone£ kan. Siwa s lkil ipwassnen i ten id Nesrusu
Nuzen ed avu isswayen. Nesse$li d aman seg igenni, yissen Nessew ikwen. Ur llin ara lexzayen is $uowen
Ih, d Nekwni i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. D Nekwni ay d Iweooaten
Ni$ Nessen imezwura nnwen, Nessen ineggura
Ih, Mass ik, Neppa, a ten id Ifser. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nexleq amdan si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Nexleq loenn, iu$ leal, si tmes n ccili
Mi Inna Mass ik, i lmalayek: "Nek Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Mi t Mesle$, u Uuuve$ as si ooue iW, ersemt $uoes, knumt
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis, iugi ad yili ar wid iknan
Inna: "a yIblis, acu ik iu$en, ur telliv ar wid iknan
Inna: "ur kennu$ i umdan, i Txelqev si talaxt taberkant i meslen
Inna: "effe$ segs! Aql ak, ihi, d imenfi
Ih, fellak ddell alamma d ass uqeiii
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi alamma d ass n tnekra nnsen
Inna: "ih, kecc seg wid ipganin
ar ass n yiumir ipwassnen
Inna: "a Mass iw! Imi yi Terriv d a$ewway, war ccekk, ad asen cebbee$ ddunit, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
Kkes ed imdanen iK izedganen garasen
Inna: "$uoI, wagi d abrid uwqim
War ccekk, ur tesaiv adabu $ef imdanen iW, siwa wid i k ivefoen seg imjaeen
Loahennama, s tidep, d ppaaud nnsen akw
D m ua tebbura; ar yal tabburt, s urbaa ines
Ih, wid ipeezziben, di leonanat akked tliwa
kecmet pen di tifrat, akked laman
Nekkes i illan d dd$el, deg idmaren nnsen. D atmaten, deg imieoeen, mqabalen
Ur aaggun degsen, ur ten id ssuffu$en segsen
Xebbeo ixdimen iW; Nek, s tidep, Psemmiee$, Peunu
U aaaqeb iW d aaaqeb aqeoean
Xebbeo iten $ef inebgawen n Iboahim
Mi kecmen $uoes, nnan: "tifrat"! Inna: "s tidep, nugad ikwen
Nnan: "ur ppagwad, a k nbecceo kan, s uqcic amusnaw
Inna: "tbecceom iyi d, mi wessre$. Acu iyi d tbeccoem
Nnan: "Nbecceo ik id, s tidep, ur ppili seg wid iuysen
Inna: "anwa iuysen aeunu n Mass is, siwa im$eooqen
Inna: "d acu ay d lmeqsud nnwen, a yimceggaen
Nnan: "Nekwni, s tidep, neppuceggaa d s agdud ibe$wviyen
Kkes ed tawacult n Lui, ara nsellek akw
siwa tameiiut is. Ih, Nseyya a ppili, neppat, seg ineggura
Mi oueen imceggaen ar twacult n Lui
inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen ur nessin
Nnan: "xaii, Nusa d, $uoek, s wayen rran di ccekk
Nusa d, $uoek, s tidep. Nekwni, war ccekk, nessawal tidep
Oue akked twacult ik, mi mazal yiv. Ddu deffir sen. Ur d itezzi yiwen degwen! Aaddit anda i wen ippunefk lameo
Nseyya yas lameo agi: a d gwrin ad pwagezmen wakali
Usan d, imezda$ n temdint, feoeen
Inna: "wigi, s tidep, d inebgawen iw, ur iyi cmmatet
Eezbet i Oebbi, ur iyi sdullut
Nnan: "day ur ak negdil ara imdanen
Inna: "atent an issi, ma taanam
S tudert ik, ar ddebdeben si ssekoan nnsen
Iwwet iten usu$u, tafrara
Nesrewt ip. Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur n yieoa n talaxt
Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i wid issnen ad ssikden
Apan, ih, deg ubrid n yal ass
Deg waya, s tidep, d assekni i lmumnin
Ih, llan At Teegi, war ccekk, d imednas
Nerra d ppao segsen. Ihi, atent an, snat nni, deg ubrid ibanen
Ni$ At Leioo skaddben imazanen
Nebbwi yasen d issekniyen nne£. Wexxoen asen
Llan qqazen ixxamen n laman, deg idurar
Iwwet iten usu$u, tauebeit
Ulay sen ixdem wayen la keppben
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep. Imir a d ias, war ccekk. Ihi, ssuref s lekyasa
Ih, Mass ik d Axellaq, d Amusnaw
Ni$ Nefka yak d ua i usniles, akked Leqwoan ameqwoaean
Ur pmuqul ar wayen is N$at kra n twaculin nnsen. Ur $webbel ilmend nnsen. Zger tacvai ik $ef lmumnin
Ini: "nekkini, s tidep, d aneddao ipbegginen
Akken id Nessers i wid ibvan
i irran Leqwoan d iericen
S Mass ik, ard a ten Nesteqsi akw
ef wayen xeddmen
Ihi, emdee ayen i$ef i k ippunefk lameo, iixxeo i imcurak
Ih, a k Nqennaa mgal wid ittihin
i irran oebbi nniven, ar tama n Oebbi. Deqqal ad eoen
Ni$ Neeoa ar ul ik, kecc, iaaueo seg wayen qqaoen
Sbuccaa Mass ik s ccekoan. Ili seg wid ikennun
Aabed Mass ik, ar k id ias utebbet
Ad ias lameo n Oebbi, ur peirit $uoes. Gedha s yiS! Ay Aalay, sennig wayen pcaraken
Issrusu d lmalayek s ooue si lameo iS, $ef win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS: "Nedoet ar ur illi oebbi siwa Nek. Ihi, eezzbet iyI
Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep. Ay Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Ixelq ed amdan si tiqqit; atan iu$al aS, d axuim n uuee
Ixelq awen d lmal, segsen iceiiiven ieman, aba$uo, u, segsen, teppeppem
D ccbaea nnwen mara ten id terrem, u mara ten teksem
Ppawin tiakkwmin nnwen ar tmurt ur teppawvem, siwa ma taapbem. Ih, Mass nnwen, war ccekk, d Umain, d Aenin
Iaewdiwen, iserdyan, i$wyal, i rrekba nnwen akked ccbaea. Ixelleq ayen ur tessinem
D Oebbi i Ippawin d ubrid. Ff$en segs. Ma ihwa yaS, a kwen Inhu meooa
D Neppa i wen d Isse$layen aman seg igenni. Segsen tissit nnwen, segsen ttjuo i itepp lmal
Isskar awen d yissen nnaama, azemmur, tizdayin, tieuoin, akked yal ppemoa. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ipxemmimen
Inub awen d s yiv akked wass, iiij akked waggur. Itran ppemnuben s lameo iS. Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud ifehmen
I wen d Ixleq di tmurt, degs initen imgarraden. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ismektayen
D Neppa i Inuben s yill, iwakken a pteppem, segs, aksum aleqqaq, a d teksem, segs, rreue i teppeqqnem. A pwaliv lbabuo ipcerrig it, iwakken a pnadim si lfevl iS, amar a ppesnemmrem
Issers idurar $ef tmurt, ur teppembwiwil yiswen; isaffen, iberdan, amar a ppepwanham
timuliwin: s yitran, nitni pwanhan
Day Win Ixelqen am win ur nxelleq? Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Lemmer a peesbem l$it n Oebbi, ur tezmirem. Ih, Oebbi, war ccekk, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Oebbi Ieoa ayen teffrem akked wayen teqqaoem
Wid u$uo pnujun, war Oebbi, ur illi wayen xelqen. D nitni i ipwaxelqen
D lmeggtin ur d imuddiren, ur eoin melmi ara ten id ssekren
Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen. Wid ur numin ara s laxeot, d ulawen nnsen i iugin. U nitni pzzuxun
War ccekk, Oebbi Ieoa ayen teffren, akked wayen qqaoen. Neppa, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara imzuxiyen
Ma nnan asen: "d acu id Issers Mass nnwen"? Qqaoen: "d timucuha imezwura
Ad bibben, ass n tnekra, tiaakkwmin nnsen, s pmam nnsent, akked wumur si taakkwmin n wid telfen, mebla ma faqen. Day macci dir it wayen bubben
Ih, undin p, wid i ten id izwaren. Oebbi Iaatad lebni nnsen, si llsas. I$li d ssqef fellasen. Iusa ten id uaaqeb seg wanda ur bnin
Sinna, ass n tnekra, a ten Idull, ad Yini: "anda ten icriken iW, i$ef temnamarem"? Nnan imawlan n tussna: "war ccekk, ddell akked ddens, assa, $ef ijehliyen
iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, nitni densen iman nnsen". A d ssutren tifrat: "ur nexdim kra n tucmip". Xaii, Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Kecmet si tebbura, ar Loahennama; degs a pwekkoem. A yicmet uxxam imzuxiyen
Ad inin i wid ipeezziben: "d acu id Issers Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d lxio". I wid imaanen, ise$ di ddunit agi. Pifxio, war ccekk, axxam aneggaru. Ay d umain uxxam n wid ipeezziben
Ad kecmen leonanat n Aaden, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen; degsen, i nitni, ayen i sen ihwan. Akka i Ipkafi Oebbi wid ipeezziben
wid iwumi ddment lmalayek leowae, nitni maanen, ad asen inint: "tifrat fellawen! Kecmet Loennet, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Day a poaoun kan tisin n lmalayek $uosen, ne$ a d iawev lameo n Mass ik? Akka ay xedmen imezwura nnsen. Ur ten Idnis Oebbi, maca densen iman nnsen
D tucmitin xeddmen, i ten iwwten. Izzi yasen wayen i$ef pmmaaliken

Nnan wid ipcaraken: "Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, ur naabed acemma, war Neppa, nekwni akked imezwura nne$. Ur negdel acemma, war ayen Igdel". Akka ay xedmen imezwura nnsen. Day illa wayen iwatan i Umazan, siwa awal ipbegginen
Ni$ Nuzen ed amazan i yal lois: "aabdet Oebbi, janbet ioebbiten n tkerkas". Garasen, llan wid Inha Oebbi; garasen, wid i$ef iura ttelfan. Iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevoa d inekkaoen
Xas toe$wbev $ef nnhaya nnsen, Oebbi, s tidep, ur Inehhu wid Itlef. Ur asen illi usettao
Ggulen s Oebbi, liman iueeean nnsen, ar ur d Ippara ara Oebbi wid immuten. Xaii, lemaahda fellas d tidep, maca tegwti n medden ur ssinen
Iwakken ad asen d ibeggen ayen i$ef mgarraden, iwakken ad eoen wid ijehlen, ar nitni, war ccekk, llan d ikeddaben
Awal nne£ kan, i t$awsa, ma Neb$a p, ad as Nini: "ili"! A ppili
Wid iunagen i Oebbi, mbaad ma pwadensen, a ten Nesserked di ddunit s yise$. Arraz n laxeot a t i$leb, war ccekk, lemmer eoin
wid iueboen u ppeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Id Nuzen, uqbel ik, siwa irgazen iwumi Nweeea. Steqsit imawlan usmekti, ma ur teeoim ara
S ubeggen akked Ihellilen, Nuzen ak d asmekti, iwakken a pbeggnev i medden, ayen i sen d irsen, amar a d mmektin
Wid iundin tucmitin, aani $ilen ur Ioemmu ara Oebbi di tmurt, ne$ ur ten id ippawev ara uaaqeb, seg wanda ur bnin
Ne$ ur ten id ikkat ara di cce$l nnsen, ur sfunnugen
Ne$ ur ten ikkat ara cwii, cwii. Ih, Mass nnwen, war ccekk, Issuruf, Ipeunu
Day ur walan ara ayen akw Ixleq Oebbi, ippara tili s yeffus, zelmev; tkennu i Oebbi, s wannuz
I Oebbi ikennu meooa wayen illan deg igenwan, akked wayen illan di tmurt, imexlaq akked lmalayek. Nitni ur sme$woen iman nnsen
Ppagwaden Mass nnsen, sennig sen, xeddmen ayen i sen ippumoen
Inna Oebbi: "ur saut sin ioebbiten. Neppa, d Oebbi Yiwen kan. Ihi, Nek, agwadet iyI
IneS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ddin, ineS i lebda. Day a teezzbem i war Oebbi
S$uo Oebbi, ayen akw ikwen i$aten. D$a mi kwen teuza lemveooa, $uoeS ay tnedhem
Sinna, mi wen Ikkes lemveooa, arbaa segwen, atnan pcaraken i Mass nnsen
Nekoen, akka, i sen Nefka. Zhut, deqqal a ppeeoem
La qesden, i wur ssinen, amur seg wayen is iten Neozeq. S Oebbi, ar fellawen asteqsi, $ef wayen id tesnulfuyem
Gern aS d, i Oebbi, tullas. Gedha s yiS! I nitni, ayen ssarmen
Ma becceon yiwen s teqcict, ad yibrik wudem is, ad iqbeo
Ad iveooef iman is, si medden, ilmend n yir usali it id ibbwven. A p ijmaa, tamara, ne$ a p irr seddaw wakal? Ay dir wamek debbioen
I wid ur numin ara s laxert: amedya ucmit. I Oebbi: amedya aalayen mavi. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Oebbi, lemmer Ipqissi medden, $ef ddens nnsen, ur d Ippaoa, degs, amexluq. Maca, Iswexxio iten ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen, ur t id seqoaben, s ssaaa
Garen aS d, i Oebbi, ayen keohen. Skaddben yilsawen nnsen, mi qqaoen ar ayen ilhan, nnsen. Ay nnsen, war ccekk, d times. Ih, nitni ad zwiren
S Oebbi, ni$ Nuzen ed, i leoyus, uqbel ik. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Assa, d bab nnsen. I nitni, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nessader ak edTazmamt, iwakken kan ad asen tbeggnev ayen i$ef mgarraden, akw i nnhaya akked ueunu i ugdud iumnen
Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni. Issader yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud isellen
Ih, ameyyez, i kunwi, di lmal. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg ufwad nnsen, ger lfert d idamen, i$i iufan, aeidan i wid itessen
Si ppemoa n tezdayin akked tfeooant, teppawim d ayen iuuekoen, akked ooezq igerzen. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ifehmen
Iweeea Mass ik i tzizwa: "gemt ixxamen deg durar, di ttjuo, di te$woasin
Sinna, eccemt si yal ppemoa. Ddumt s wannuz, iberdan n Mass nnkwent. Iteffe$ ed seg iaabbav nnsent ayen tessen, n yal ini, degs eellu i imdanen". Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ipxemmimen
Ixelq ikwen Oebbi, sinna, ad awen Iddem ooue. Kra, segwen, ad ccerfeffen mavi, alamma ur ppissinen acemma mbaad ma ssnen. Ih, Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Aeernuk
Oebbi Ismenyaf ad I$it kra i wiyav. Wid Ismenyaf, ur ilaq ara ad rren, ooeeq nnsen, i waklan nnsen, d$a ad aadlen yidsen. Day ara nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Iga yawen Oebbi, seg iman nnwen, tilawin nnwen. Ifka yawen, si tlawin nnwen, arraw d warraw n warraw. Ioeeq ikwen s wayen ilhan. Day ad amnen di tkerkas, ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Aabden, war Oebbi, wid ur nesai acemma, swayes ara ten oeeqen, si tmurt akked igenwan, u ur zmiren
Ur d ppawit imedyaten i Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem

Ifka d Oebbi amedya n wakli, d ayla, ur izmir i wacemma, akked yiwen iwumi Nefka, s $uone£, ooeeq ilhan. Ipseddiq, segs, s tuffra ne$ ainani. Day aadlen? Ccekoan i Oebbi. Maca, tegwti, segsen, ur ssinen
Ifka d Oebbi amedya n sin irgazen. Yiwen d agugam, ur izmir i wacemma. D taakkwemt i bab is. Anda it iuzen, ur d ippawi lxio. Day iaadel akked win ippamoen leeqq, u neppa deg ubrid uwqim
N Oebbi tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Lameo n yimir, am unqaj n tii kan, ne$ ur ibbwiv. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Oebbi Issuffe$ ikwen id si taabbav n tyimmatin nnwen, ur tessinem acemma. Ifka yawen timejjin, ieoi, ul, amar a ppesnemmrem
Day ur walan ara ifoax, teeppem fellasen lhawa igenni, ur ten iiiif yiwen siwa Oebbi? Deg waya, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen

Oebbi Irra yawen ixxamen nnwen d tanezdu$t. Irra yawen ixxamen, s igwelman n lmal nnwen. Fessusit, ass n yinig, d wass uqeggel. Tadui nnsen, ccaao nnsen, ineaden nnsen, i leewal akked dduzan, tallit kan

Deg wayen Ixleq, Oebbi Ifka yawen d tili. Irra yawen, deg idurar, uuoanat. Ifka yawen iceiiiven i kwen isdarayen seg u$amac, iceiiiven i kwen ipfukkun si lbe$wv nnwen. Akka, ad awen Itim l$it iS. Amar a ppanzem
Ma wexxoen, i illan fellak, siwa awal ipbegginen
Aaqlen l$it n Oebbi, sinna, nekoen t. Tegwti, degsen, d ijehliyen
Ass ideg ara d Nessker, si yal lois, anagi, imiren ur ippili tesrie i wid ijehlen, u nitni ur ste$fioen
Mi walan, imednas, aaaqeb, ur ippifsus fellasen, ur ppestaafun
Mi walan, wid ipcaraken, wid curken, ad inin: "a Mass nne$! D wigi i d icriken nne$ u$uo nepnuju, war Kecc". Ad asen d rren: "kunwi, war ccekk, d ikeddaben
Assen, ad fken mayna i Oebbi. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Wid ijehlen, u siixxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, Nerna yasen aaaqeb sennig wayev, ilmend n wayen ssefsaden
Ass ideg ara d Nessker, i yal lois, anagi segsen, fellasen, a k id Nawi d anagi mgal wigi. Nessers ak d Tazmamt, d abeggen n yal cci, d nnhaya, d aeunu, u d abecceo i imvuaen
Ih, Oebbi Iumeo ed leeqq, akked lewqama, talalt i llzem. Igdel tucmitin, ayen n dir, ddeok. A kwen Ipnabi, amar a d temmektim
Eiifet di lemaahda n Oebbi ma taahdem. Ur eentet di tgallit ma tetebbtem, u tcubkem Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ieoa acu txeddmem

Ur cebbut tin ifsin lxiv is, mbaad ma tcudd it, s loehd. Tepparam tagallit nnwen i umkellex garawen: ad ikk lois sennig wayev. Oebbi Ipjeooib ikwen kan, yis. War ccekk, ad awen Ibeggen, ass n tnekra, ayen i$ef temgarradem
Lemmer i S ihwi, i Oebbi, a kwen Irr d yiwen n lois. Maca, Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. S tidep, a ppepusteqsim $ef wayen txeddmem
Ur pparat tagallit nnwen i umkellex garawen. Ad iccev uvao mbaad ma iiief. A pjeobem tawa$it, ilmend n wayen tveoofem seg ubrid n Oebbi. I kunwi, aaaqeb abarar
Ur ppa$et s lemaahda n Oebbi ayen oxisen. Ih, yif it i kunwi wayen illan $eo Oebbi, lemmer teeoim
Ayen illan $uowen, ad ifukk; ayen illan $eo Oebbi, ad idum. War ccekk, a Nkafi wid iueboen, s wazal n wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Wid ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d ddkeo ne$ d nnta, u umnen, a ten Nessider di tmeddurt tumaint, a ten Nkafi s wazal n wayen xeddmen ifuqen
Mara te$oev Leqwoan, ssuter a k Iaateq Oebbi, si Cciian imenfi
Neppa, s tidep, ur isai adabu $ef wid iumnen, i ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
Adabu ines, $ef wid kan i t irran d bab, d wid i S ipcaraken
Ma Nbeddel assekni s ussekni, u Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen ayen id Issers, a d inin: "kecc, d win kan id isnulfuyen". Xaii! Tegwti, degsen, ur ssinen
Ini: "Issers it id ooue ioqan, s$uo Mass ik, s tidep, iwakken ad itebbet wid iumnen; d nnhaya u d abecceo i imvuaen
Ih, Neeoa, qqaoen: "d amdan kan it isselmaden". Tameslayt n win d gren, d tabeooanit, wagi d awal aaoab n uuee
Ih, wid ur numin ara s issekniyen n Oebbi, ur ten Inehhu Oebbi. I nitni, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ih, gren d kan tikerkas, wid ur numin ara s issekniyen n Oebbi. Widak, d nitni ay d ikeddaben
Win inekoen Oebbi, deffir liman is, siwa ma eeppmen fellas, u ul is izga iumen…. Ma d wid illin idmaren nnsen, ar tijehli, ad Izaaf Oebbi fellasen. Fellasen aaaqeb abarar
Ayagi, acku smenyafen tameddurt n ddunit i laxeot. Ih, Oebbi ur Inehhu agdud ijehliyen
D wigi iwumi Isle$ Oebbi ulawen nnsen, timejjin nnsen, ieoi nnsen. Wigi d i$efliyen
War ccekk, nitni, di laxeot, ad ilin d imexsuoen
Sinna, Mass ik, s tidep, i wid iunagen mbaad ma thewwlen, sinna juhden, ueboen; ih, Mass ik, deffir waya, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ass ideg ara d ias, yal yiwen, ad inamer $ef yiman is, u yal yiwen ad iiiukafi $ef wayen ixdem, nitni ur pwadensen
Ifka d Oebbi amedya n temdint, i illan di laman u iimana. Ippas ip id ooeeq is, s lufa, si yal tama. Tenkeo l$it n Oebbi. Isukk Oebbi fellas tawa$it n llae akked lweec, ilmend n wayen la uuenaan
Ni$ iusa ten id umazan, segsen. Skaddben t, iwwet iten uaaqeb, nitni densen
Eccet seg wayen is ikwen I$at Oebbi, i ieellen, i imaanen. Snemmret l$it n Oebbi, ma d Neppa ay taabdem
I yawen Igdel siwa loifa, idim, aksum n yilef, akked wayen id irsen s yisem ur nelli d win n Oebbi. Ma d win terra tmara, ur ijuo, ur inufeq, Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ur qqaoet tikerkas id ppawin ilsawen nnwen: "aya d leelal, aya d leeoam". A d tegrem tikerkas $ef Oebbi. Wid id iggaren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ur rebeen
Drus ara zhun, fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
I wudayen, Negdel ayen i$ef i k Neeka, iu$ leal. Ur ten Nednis, maca nitni ddennisen iman nnsen
Sinna, Mass ik, i wid ixedmen cceoo, ur ssinen, d$a steooaen deffir waya, u sweqmen, Mass ik, war ccekk, deffir waya, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Iboahim, ih, d amdan i imalen ar tidep, i iunzen i Oebbi. Ur illi seg imcurak
Isnemmar l$it iS. Ifren it u Inha t s abrid uwqim
Nefka yas di ddunit ise$, u, di laxeot, neppa, s tidep, ad yili seg izedganen
Sinna, Nweeea yak d a ppedduv d ddin n Iboahim, i imalen ar tidep. Ur illi seg imcurak
Ssebt, iu$al kan i wid imgarraden fellas. Ih, Mass ik ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen llan mgarraden
Enced s abrid n Mass ik, s uuwab akked nnhaya tumaint. Mmeslay iten, s yiles aeidan mavi. Ih, Mass ik Yif akw akken Issen, anwi i iff$en seg ubrid iS. Neppa Yif akw akken Issen, anwi i ipwanhan
Ma taaqbem, aaqbet akken teppuaaqbem. Ma tueboem, yif it i iueboiyen
Eubeo. Uuebo ik s Oebbi kan. Ur $webben ilmend nnsen, ur pveyyiq si tcengal nnsen
Ih, Oebbi Atan ar wid ipeezziben, akked wid issewqamen
